full_text: The Department of Central Engineering shall consist of the Chief Engineer, who shall be its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as deemed necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by the Council.

0.text: The Department of Central Engineering shall consist of the Chief Engineer, who shall be its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as deemed necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by the Council.

1.name: ARTICLE A. - DEPARTMENT OF CENTRAL ENGINEERING
1.label: article

2.name: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF CENTRAL ENGINEERING

1.catch_line: FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT.

next_section.catch_line: FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

CHIEF ENGINEER, OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES. (§ 6-1001)

The Department of Central Engineering shall consist of the Chief Engineer, who
shall be its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as
deemed necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by
the Council.
